name: Lifecast
headline: Software to create 3D video for VR, robotics and film.
description: We make tools for state-of-the-art 3D VR video, which fix motion sickness for a more comfortable and immersive experience. Our team's experience includes building VR cameras at Facebook, and robot perception systems at Lyft and Google X.

founders.name: Forrest Briggs, Founder
founders.description: Forrest (CEO at Lifecast) has a Ph.D. in machine learning and over 20 patents in VR video and AI perception systems. He previously developed computer-vision based VR video rendering software at Facebook, and was a tech lead at Lyft and Google X working on perception systems for self-driving cars and robots.

markdown:
raw_markdown="[Lifecast](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<index.html>)
  * [Products](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<#products>)
  * [Library](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/library.lifecastvr.com>)
  * [Company](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<company.html>)
  * [Blog](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/fbriggs.medium.com/>)
  * [GitHub](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/github.com/fbriggs/lifecast_public>)
  * info@lifecastvr.com


# Volumetric Video Editor
Capture volumetric video in any environment, with 8K+ resolution and 180 degree FOV, using any VR180 camera. Render with Lifecast, then deploy to Unreal Engine, Unity, WebXR, Desktop, Mobile, Quest, or Looking Glass. Create photorealistic video backgrounds for virtual production, or uniquely immersive mixed reality experiences.
[Pro $299/mo](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/buy.stripe.com/3cseY87TfaJ8eDC3co>)
[Non-Commercial $7.99/mo](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/buy.stripe.com/9AQg2cflH18y1QQ28l>)
[About](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<volumetric_video_editor.html>)
![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/stn_thumb.png)
[Watch on Quest Browseror any 2D screen](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/www.lifecastvr.com/onstage_sixturnsnine_moments.html>)
![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/canon_icon64.png)
# Capture volumetric video with any VR180 camera
  * Use any VR180 camera, such as the Canon EOS R5 with RF 5.2mm f/2.8 Dual Fisheye 3D lens
  * VR180 cameras have higher resolution and field of view than traditional depth sensors
  * Lifecast enables you to capture a full scene including the background, not just a single person or object
  * Beyond light stages, VR180 cameras are highly portable and can be used in remote locations
  * Beyond photogrammetry and NeRF, Lifecast's LDI3 format and rendering pipeline handles video and motion


![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/vve_icon_64.png)
# [Volumetric Video Editor for Windows, Mac](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<volumetric_video_editor.html>)
  * Render VR180 to volumetric (LDI3) format using state-of-the-art machine learning for stereo depth estimation
  * Edit volumetric video channels and preview 3D results in real-time
  * Automatically encode video in standard formats for deployment in Unreal, Unity, or javascript (web, mobile, VR)


![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/vve_icon_64.png)
# [UpscaleVideo.ai for Windows, Mac](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/upscalevideo.ai>)
  * Increase video resolution using AI (super resolution)
  * Upscale 8K to 12K or 16K, ideal for VR video
  * Input .mp4, .mov, .png, .jpg, .gif, professional output encoding with ffmpeg for h264, h265, ProRes, PNG sequence


![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/vve_icon_64.png)
# [Volurama: Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) for Windows, Mac](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/volurama.com>)
  * Capture volumetric panoramas using a short video from a phone
  * A simple GUI makes it easy to run a powerful computer vision pipeline which estimates camera motion and builds a photorealistic 3D model of the scene
  * You can render the scene from the point of view of a virtual camera which moves smoothly, which would otherwise require expensive equipment such as dollys or booms.
  * Render 2D Video, VR180 (stereoscopic), or Looking Glass hologram.


![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/cc_icon64.png)
# [Royalty Free Volumetric Video Library](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/library.lifecastvr.com>)
  * A collection of high-quality volumetric videos, ready for use in your application
  * Captured in 8K with a Canon EOS R5 with dual fisheye lense for exceptional image quality


![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/unreal_icon64.png)
# Open Source Volumetric Video Player for Unreal Engine 5
  * [Download Lifecast Volumetric Video Player for Unreal Engine 5 project files](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/github.com/fbriggs/lifecast_public/raw/main/UnrealEngine5/Lifecast_LDI3_Player_UE5.1.zip>)
  * [Tutorial: Virtual production with volumetric video and text-to-3D in Unreal Engine](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=ekEXxo1neVo&list=PLNvwdoUFjGDDmaXbbmCFcfIhD9VQabwVc&index=1&ab_channel=Lifecast>)
  * [Tutorial: Volumetric video in Unreal Engine](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=COk4Szd84hw&list=PLNvwdoUFjGDDmaXbbmCFcfIhD9VQabwVc&index=2&ab_channel=Lifecast>)


![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/unity_icon64.png)
# Open Source Volumetric Video Player for Unity
  * [Download Lifecast Volumetric Video Player Unity Project](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/drive.google.com/file/d/197Ea3MHUKMsS4BUy86iVwGukmClV0V_9/view?usp=share_link>)
  * [Tutorial: Volumetric Video and Photos in Unity](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<tutorial_unity.html>)


![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/webxr_icon64.png)
# Open Source Volumetric Video Player for Javascript, WebXR
  * [Lifecast Volumetric Video Player Github for Javascript and WebXR](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/github.com/fbriggs/lifecast_public/tree/main/web>)
  * [Tutorial: Volumetric Video in Javascript and WebXR](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<tutorial_webvr.html>)
  * Watch volumetric video the Meta Quest 2 or Quest Pro using the VR browser (no install required)
  * The same web page also works on 2D screens and phones
  * Integrate volumetric video into your website


![](http://www.lifecastvr.com/looking_glass_icon64.png)
# Volumetric Video and Photos for Looking Glass
  * [How to create volumetric video for Looking Glass with VR180 cameras](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=JNk_fvk2F9w&list=PLNvwdoUFjGDDmaXbbmCFcfIhD9VQabwVc&t=2s&ab_channel=Lifecast>)
  * [Github - Lifecast WebXR / Looking Glass examples](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/github.com/fbriggs/lifecast_public/blob/main/web>)


Subscribe
Copyright © 2023 Lifecast Incorporated. [End User License Agreement](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<eula.html>).
  * [](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/www.facebook.com/groups/1075792393218140>)
  * [](http://www.lifecastvr.com/<https:/twitter.com/LifecastI>)

generated_description:
**Lifecast: Bringing Immersive Storytelling to Life**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the innovation hub of Palo Alto, Lifecast is on a mission to redefine the world of 3D video creation. They've built a platform aimed explicitly at producing high-quality volumetric video for various applications, including virtual reality (VR), film, and robotics. The company's roots trace back to its earlier vision: creating cutting-edge tools for capturing 3D VR video that alleviates motion sickness, offering users a more enjoyable and immersive viewing experience.

**The Team Behind the Vision**

Lifecast operates with a lean team of just two employees, but don't underestimate their capabilities. The company's founders bring a wealth of experience from top tech companies like Facebook and Lyft, specifically focusing on VR camera systems and robotics perception. This expertise lends a strong technical foundation to their ambitious venture.

**Innovative Solutions for Creative Professionals**

At the core of Lifecast's offerings is their *Volumetric Video Editor*, which allows creators to capture and render stunning 8K+ volumetric video using any VR180 camera. This flexibility facilitates the creation of photorealistic video backgrounds and immersive mixed-reality experiences across platforms like Unreal Engine, Unity, and even mobile devices. With pricing models catering to both professionals ($299/month) and non-commercial users ($7.99/month), Lifecast makes its technology accessible to a broad audience.

In addition to the video editor, they offer a suite of tools, including:

- **UpscaleVideo.ai**: A powerful AI-driven solution enabling users to enhance video resolution significantly, perfect for VR applications.
- **Volurama**: A tool for capturing volumetric panoramas that simplifies the process for creators using just a smartphone.
- A **Royalty Free Volumetric Video Library**: A collection of high-quality content available for integration into various projects.

**Open-Source Initiatives**

Lifecast is also committed to the open-source community, providing resources such as volumetric video players for Unreal Engine and Unity, and tutorials on how to integrate this technology into projects seamlessly. This approach not only showcases their technology but also fosters a community of developers and creators.

**The Road Ahead**

With their innovative tools and commitment to enhancing the creator experience, Lifecast is positioned to make a substantial impact in the fields of virtual reality and film production. Their involvement with Y Combinator (Batch W22) signifies broader backing and growth potential. As they continue to refine their technology, the team at Lifecast is likely to play a pivotal role in shaping the future of immersive storytelling.

For more information, you can check out their website at [Lifecast VR](http://www.lifecastvr.com).
